title: Digital Integrated Microlearning Course for Remote Medical Education and Clinical Skill Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Basic Understanding of Digital Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented online course for healthcare job seekers and novice learners, emphasizing situation-based clinical skills training using mobile devices

learning_goals: Explain and demonstrate three or more remote diagnosis protocols using digital simulation tools
Apply five core elements of patient communication skills to real-world cases through mobile-based microlearning modules
Develop a remote clinical skills assessment framework through project-based assignments incorporating peer evaluation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
